title: New: IYES – Glow
body:
There’s a fine line between exploiting a catchy melody and riding it, a difference between shoving a hook in a face to offering it.

The new track from ‘CitR bro/sis 4 lyf’, **IYES**, toes this line to perfection in their new track _GLOW_. Like in their debut track, _lighthouse_, the track features several eruptions that manage to hit he spot EVERY FUCKING TIME.

2nd March 2013 – The Shacklewell Arms, Dalston, London.  
26th March 2013 – Village Underground w/WAVE MACHINES, Shoreditch, London.

Hit play below.
